title: Chocolate Cake
procedure: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, baking powder, and salt in a bowl.
Add eggs, milk, and butter, then whisk until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 30-35 minutes until a toothpick comes out clean.
Let it cool before serving.

title: Ice Cream
procedure: Whisk together cream, milk, sugar, and vanilla extract.
Pour into an ice cream maker and churn until thick.
Transfer to a container and freeze for 4 hours.
Scoop and serve chilled.

title: Brownies
procedure: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F).
Melt butter and chocolate together.
Stir in sugar, eggs, and vanilla extract.
Fold in flour and cocoa powder.
Pour into a greased baking pan.
Bake for 25–30 minutes, then cool before cutting.

title: Cheesecake
procedure: Preheat oven to 160°C (320°F).
Mix crushed biscuits with melted butter and press into a springform pan.
Beat cream cheese, sugar, eggs, and vanilla until smooth.
Pour mixture over crust and bake for 50 minutes.
Chill in the fridge for at least 4 hours before serving.

title: Fruit Tart
ingredients: 2 tbsp sugar syrup or apricot glaze
procedure: Bake a tart shell until golden brown.
Prepare pastry cream and let it cool.
Fill the tart shell with the cream.
Top with assorted fresh fruits like strawberries, kiwi, and blueberries.
Glaze with a light sugar syrup for shine.
Chill and serve.
